text: Do you believe were able to measure the hole in the Ozone layer?    Do you believe that by eliminating CFCs from aerosols, we allowed the hole to begin shrinking?

You’re clearly trolling but I’ll indulge you. The 1986 Montreal Protocol phased out the CFCs damaging the Ozone Layer & the hole is slowly closing.   Taxes change the relative prices of things & people generally buy more of things that are cheaper and less of more expensive things
